thread.section_title: Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value for money
thread.title_full: Good value for money - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: yasotravels
title: Good value for money
text: We stayed two nights in the hotel, normally i book always 4 stars at least but the good reviews convinced me. Good location with many spots in walking distance, and big room for New York Standards. Nice staff and clean facilities. For the price we payed there is absolutely nothing to complain about, i have stayed in more expensive Hotels in and the Rooms were neither as modern nor as big.
